==============================
Godley & Lavoie (2006) - GL06
==============================

This is the documentation of the models from the seminal textbook *Monetary Economics: An Integrated Approach to Credit, Money, Income, Production and Wealth* by Wynne Godley and Marc Lavoie, published by Palgrave MacMillan, December 2006.
ISBN: 978-1-137-08599-3 `Link to publisher <https://link.springer.com/book/10.1007/978-1-137-08599-3>`_. The implemented models are:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   SIM <GL06SIM>
   SIMEX <GL06SIMEX>
   PC <GL06PC>
   PCEX <GL06PCEX>
   PCEX2 <GL06PCEX2>
